title: Why authors should avoid aria-relevant
description: The ARIA attribute, aria-relevant, is supposed to affect how live regions are processed by screen readers. It is designed to provide a hint to screen readers that content being removed from a webâ€¦
author: Rob Dodson

title: Using the aria-relevant attribute
description: The aria-relevant attribute is an optional value used to describe what types of changes have occurred to an aria-live region, and which are relevant and should be announced. Any change that is not relevant acts in the same manner it would if the aria-live attribute were set to off.
